trans-unit.source: about_Quoting_Rules
trans-unit.target: about_Quoting_Rules

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: About Quoting Rules
trans-unit.target: 有關引號的規則

trans-unit.source: about_Quoting_Rules
trans-unit.target: about_Quoting_Rules

trans-unit.source: about_Quoting_Rules
trans-unit.target: about_Quoting_Rules

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 簡短描述

trans-unit.source: Describes rules for using single and double quotation marks in Windows PowerShell�.
trans-unit.target: 說明在 Windows PowerShell 中使用單引號和雙引號的規則。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 詳細描述

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks are used to specify a literal string.
trans-unit.target: 引號用來指定常值字串。

trans-unit.source: You can enclose a string in single quotation marks (') or double quotation marks (").
trans-unit.target: 您可以在單引號 （'） 或雙引號 （"） 括住的字串。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks are also used to create a here-string.
trans-unit.target: 引號內也會用於建立此字串。

trans-unit.source: A here-string is a single-quoted or double-quoted string in which quotation marks are interpreted literally.
trans-unit.target: 此字串是單引號或雙引號括住的字串中的引號會解譯為常值。

trans-unit.source: A here-string can span multiple lines.
trans-unit.target: 此字串可以跨越多行程式碼。

trans-unit.source: All the lines in a here-string are interpreted as strings, even though they are not enclosed in quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 在這裡字串中的所有行都解譯為字串，即使它們不會以引號括住。

trans-unit.source: In commands to remote computers, quotation marks define the parts of the command that are run on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 在命令至遠端電腦中，引號會定義會在遠端電腦執行指令的組件。

trans-unit.source: In a remote session, quotation marks also determine whether the variables in a command are interpreted first on the local computer or on the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 在遠端工作階段中，引號內也會決定是否在命令中的變數解譯先在本機電腦或遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: SINGLE AND DOUBLE-QUOTED STRINGS
trans-unit.target: 單引號與雙引號括住的字串

trans-unit.source: When you enclose a string in double quotation marks (a double-quoted string), variable names that are preceded by a dollar sign ($) are replaced with the variable's value before the string is passed to the command for processing.
trans-unit.target: 當您將字串括在雙引號內 （雙引號括住字串） 時，會加上錢幣符號 （$） 的變數名稱會取代變數的值之前的字串會傳遞至命令處理。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: Also, in a double-quoted string, expressions are evaluated, and the result is inserted in the string.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在雙引號括住的字串中，會評估運算式，而且結果插入字串中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: When you enclose a string in single-quotation marks (a single-quoted string), the string is passed to the command exactly as you type it.
trans-unit.target: 當您將字串括在引號單一 （單引號字串） 時，按照您在輸入傳遞的字串到命令。

trans-unit.source: No substitution is performed.
trans-unit.target: 替代項目會執行。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: Similarly, expressions in single-quoted strings are not evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，單一括住的字串中的運算式會評估。

trans-unit.source: They are interpreted as literals.
trans-unit.target: 它們會被解譯為常值。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: To prevent the substitution of a variable value in a double-quoted string, use the backtick character (`)(ASCII 96), which is the Windows PowerShell escape character.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免雙引號括住的字串中的變數值替代，使用 Windows PowerShell 逸出字元倒單引號字元 （'） (ASCII 96)。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the backtick character that precedes the first $i variable prevents Windows PowerShell from replacing the variable name with its value.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，位於第一個 $i 變數倒單引號字元可防止 Windows PowerShell 變數的名稱取代它的值。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: To make double-quotation marks appear in a string, enclose the entire string in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 若要出現在字串中的雙引號，請將整個字串括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: You can also enclose a single-quoted string in a double-quoted string.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以將單引號的字串括在雙引號括住的字串中。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: Or, double the quotation marks around a double-quoted phrase.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您也可以按兩下雙引號括住片語周圍的引號。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: To include a single quotation mark in a single-quoted string, use a second consecutive single quote.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含在單引號字串中的單引號，使用第二個連續單引號。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: To force Windows PowerShell to interpret a double quotation mark literally, use a backtick character.
trans-unit.target: 若要強制 Windows PowerShell 將雙引號常值，請使用倒單引號字元。

trans-unit.source: This prevents Windows PowerShell from interpreting the quotation mark as a string delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止 Windows PowerShell 解譯為字串分隔符號引號。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: Because the contents of single-quoted strings are interpreted literally, you cannot use the backtick character to force a literal character interpretation in a single-quoted string.
trans-unit.target: 單引號字串的內容會逐字解譯，因為您無法使用倒單引號字元以強制在單引號字串中的常值字元解譯。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command generates an error because Windows PowerShell does not recognize the escape character.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令產生錯誤，因為 Windows PowerShell 無法辨識的逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it interprets the second quotation mark as the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會解譯字串的結尾為第二個引號。

trans-unit.source: HERE-STRINGS
trans-unit.target: 這裡字串

trans-unit.source: The quotation rules for here-strings are slightly different.
trans-unit.target: 此字串的引號規則會稍有不同。

trans-unit.source: A here-string is a single-quoted or double-quoted string in which quotation marks are interpreted literally.
trans-unit.target: 此字串是單引號或雙引號括住的字串中的引號會解譯為常值。

trans-unit.source: A here-string can span multiple lines.
trans-unit.target: 此字串可以跨越多行程式碼。

trans-unit.source: All the lines in a here-string are interpreted as strings even though they are not enclosed in quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 在這裡字串中的所有行會被都解譯為字串，即使它們不會以引號括住。

trans-unit.source: Like regular strings, variables are replaced by their values in double-quoted here-strings.
trans-unit.target: 像一般的字串，由雙引號括住 here 字串的值取代變數。

trans-unit.source: In single-quoted here-strings, variables are not replaced by their values.
trans-unit.target: 在單引號 here-string，其值不會取代變數。

trans-unit.source: You can use here-strings for any text, but they are particularly useful for the following kinds of text:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這裡字串之任何文字，但它們特別適用於下列幾種文字︰

trans-unit.source: -- Text that contains literal quotation marks -- Multiple lines of text, such as the text in an HTML or XML -- The Help text for a script or function document
trans-unit.target: -包含常值引號-多行文字，例如 HTML 或 XML-指令碼或函式的文件的說明文字中文字的文字

trans-unit.source: A here-string can have either of the following formats, where <Enter> represents the linefeed or newline hidden character that is added when you press the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 這裡字串具有下列格式，其中 <Enter> 代表換行字元或新行字元會隱藏您按下 ENTER 鍵時所加入的字元。

trans-unit.source: In either format, the closing quotation mark must be the first character in the line.
trans-unit.target: 在任一格式，引號必須是行中的第一個字元。

trans-unit.source: A here-string contains all the text between the two hidden characters.
trans-unit.target: 此字串包含隱藏的兩個字元之間的所有文字。

trans-unit.source: In the here-string, all quotation marks are interpreted literally.
trans-unit.target: 在這裡字串中，所有的引號會解譯為常值。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: Using a here-string can simplify using a string in a command.
trans-unit.target: 使用此字串可以簡化在命令中使用的字串。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: In single-quoted here-strings, variables are interpreted literally and reproduced exactly.
trans-unit.target: 在單引號 here-string，變數會解譯為常值，並完全重製。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: In double-quoted here-strings, variables are replaced by their values.
trans-unit.target: 以雙引號括住 here 字串，其值來取代變數。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: The output of this command is:
trans-unit.target: 這個命令的輸出如下︰

trans-unit.source: Here-strings are typically used to assign multiple lines to a variable.
trans-unit.target: 這裡字串通常用於多行程式碼指派給變數。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following here-string assigns a page of XML to the $page variable.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，這裡下列字串會將頁面的 XML 指派給 $page 變數。

trans-unit.source: Here-strings are also a convenient format for input to the ConvertFrom-StringData cmdlet, which converts here-strings to hash tables.
trans-unit.target: 這裡字串也是方便的格式輸入 Convertfrom-stringdata 指令程式，將此字串轉換成雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see ConvertFrom-StringData.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Convertfrom-stringdata。

trans-unit.target: 關鍵字
